segments.text: Taylor , you're looking a little pale . Are you sure you want to hand out nametags ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have a choice ? You said the guy who was supposed to do it didn't show .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: True . Keep up the good work . Hello , welcome to the reunion of the Class of ' 93 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just come over here , sir . First you need to sign in and get your photo nametag .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And don't forget to put in an order for your reunion memory book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to donate to our alumni fund ?
segments.speaker: S2
